text: Mustapha Azahari Maarof (1 January 1935 â€“ 15 December 2014) was a Malaysian actor. He was known for his roles in Hang Tuah (1959), 1957: Hati Malaya (2007) and Chermin (2007). Maarof died in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia from respiratory failure at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2014 deaths Category:People from Negeri Sembilan Category:Malaysian actors Category:Movie actors
